website_summaries.verdict: Attractive boots that pair nicely with numerous looks and all seasons. The decent price is also a selling point.
pros: The comfortable fit and low, stacked heels are ideal for walking and standing for long periods of time
Versatile style works for all-year wear
Faux suede appeals to consumers who prefer not to wear animal-based materials
Fit is true to size for most
cons: Tops of boots have a tendency to "slouch" down, especially on wearers with thinner thighs

customer_reviews.title: They definitely fit best when worn over jeans
customer_reviews.text: Being a woman of my size it is hard to find a pair of thigh-high boots that will actually fit over the thick thighs. These boots surprisingly did their job. I thought “how are these boots gonna fit over these huge thighs of mine” but they surprised me. They definitely fit best when worn over jeans. I am currently looking at all colors. Choosing to buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These boots are absolutely amazing! I am pretty tall
customer_reviews.text: These boots are absolutely amazing! I am pretty tall, 5'9" with long legs. I'm a size 10 in pants and size 9 in shoes - I was really surprised the boots were so tall (way over my knees) and weren't too tight! I was worried the boots would dig into my leg and make them look fat - but they don't dig in and don't fall down too much either - just a bit but it's ok, I like it. I do however think that they might be too wide for very skinny girls, maybe... Overall - incredible and comfy boots, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Avigail Perl

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great! They run true to size (I ordered an 8 thinking they might run small but they do not. I should have ordered a 7.5 but they still fit alright), and they reach about mid thigh on me. I have not run into any problems with them falling down my leg. I'm 5'4" 135 lbs for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great Thigh High Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I loovvvveee this boots. When i first opened the box i was so upset i never thought they’d fit, i was pleasantly surprised!! Once you put them on the have a TON ago stretch! I’ve had the hardest time trying to find boots that go up mid thigh because as you can see my thighs pretty thick. I ordered a half size larger to make sure mine would fit but i think my normal size would’ve worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Candidly Ty

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are everything and more. I saw some reviews saying to order a size up, I ordered my normal sIze 10, and i'm happy I didn't order up. They are comfortable. The perfect thigh high boot with low/minimal heel that I was looking for. I have thick thighs (size 12-14 womens in most pnts/ bottoms) and am very tall (5'10) so I was worried that they wouldn't stretch or be tall as I wanted but they stretch PLENTY and are very comfy. Pic is shown. Ordering a black pair soon!
customer_reviews.author: Des.Shopps

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: Love them so much they are perfect I have skinny legs so I was worried that they will be to big but they were not. Loved them so much bought a tan pair as well and next is burgindy
customer_reviews.author: Jen perez

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so cute! I bought them for my Halloween costume but will definitely be wearing them for everyday as well. I am super picky when it comes to boots...so me liking them says a lot! I am between a size 7.5 and 8. I ordered an 8. They are slightly loose around my thighs...but I like that they are a little slouchy. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Pearson-Beck

customer_reviews.title: 💓
customer_reviews.text: These are cute but I wish they ha a drawstring or something to keep them tight around the leg!!! Other than that , great buy
customer_reviews.author: Mikky

customer_reviews.title: The foot of the shoe fit perfectly, however if ...
customer_reviews.text: The foot of the shoe fit perfectly, however if you wanted to wear a sock, you'll need to go 1/2 size up! I returned the boots because they don't stay up on my thigh at all. They slouch to my knee and I don't want that look.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Stenzel

customer_reviews.title: Size 7 - Too Tight, Weird Slouch on Ankle Area
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'3 125 lbs. Bought size 7. The leg was a little too tight for my liking. The cloth also didn't seem to hold up well in the ankle area and had an odd looking bump on the inseam due to the zipper's weight. I wanted to like it, but it just didn't fit well enough and I have a feeling the slouch near the ankle was going to increase with time and look even more awkward.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Overall they’re really good quality and super cute but if you don’t have ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit as expected as far as the shoe itself goes, but unlike the other pair of thigh high boots i have these don’t have a string to tighten them at the top so they’re constantly falling down. Overall they’re really good quality and super cute but if you don’t have super thick thighs then you can expect to pull them up after every step you take. (For reference I’m 5’9 and wear a size 11 and they come to mid thigh)
customer_reviews.author: Kailyn

customer_reviews.title: Fits snug like the way I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Fits snug like the way I hoped! It doesn't slide down like the other styles that has a lace tie in the back. These are just pull up and it stretches. I have been looking for boots like this that will fit my wide calves and this fits perfectly! I may not be able to wear it with skinny jeans, but I can wear with leggings! Cute and comfy addition to my boot collection! Worth the money and the price is good!
customer_reviews.author: Lorena C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Athletic Calves
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on these, and was not disappointed! As a former figure skater, my calves are pretty thick and give me trouble when it comes to high boots. But wide calf boots are usually too baggy for me, especially around the ankles. These have just enough stretch to hug curves, stay up while walking, and look great. The soles are sturdy and supportive, but the tread is not particularly deep. You may want to add some sole grips if you plan to wear them in cold, wet weather. Overall I'm very pleased, and I plan to buy these in at least one other color.
customer_reviews.author: Elly F

customer_reviews.title: Better than I though they’d be.
customer_reviews.text: The first night I wore them I went to a concert and was standing for 5 hours plus. I must say that they were surprisingly comfortable and left me with little to no pain the next day. They fit just above the knee and are my exact fit. I would really like for the legging part of it to be a little tighter on the leg so I could avoid pulling them up, but they still look cute. I would definitely buy them in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Not for girls with slim thighs.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these boots, and mostly I did. They were cute and came up to just the right height. I unfortunately had to return them because they were not tight on my thigh. Where the top of the boot hits my thigh measures 17in (about mid thigh) and there was a 2in gap from the boot. It looked quite silly so I sent it back. I wish that thigh high boots would come in skinny thigh and wide thigh but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: deLUXmomma

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today. I love it! I’m 5’0 so was a little unsure how high these would be but it comes up to about mid thigh, perfect! Color is nice and fits true to size. Even allows a little room for thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: Weniki

customer_reviews.title: Skinny calves do not but these
customer_reviews.text: I mean they were cute and VERY tall (5’11 and it was almost too tall for me I rolled them down) but I had to return them because with having skinnier calves they were way to big around my ankles not even close to being tight like the picture and with one step they sagged. If you had a bigger leg these would def work for you but girls with skinny legs find a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Amaguana’s

customer_reviews.title: Love good looking OTK boots!
customer_reviews.text: The boots was nice and looks expensive, I ordered my real size 7.5 after reading the review that these boots are TTS. I just have to exchange it though for size 8, because although it fits, there is no room for thicker socks and it may hurt after awhile of walking, other than that these boots are worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: A.C.T

customer_reviews.title: Fit Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! From reading the reviews I thought that they were going to be too small but, there were some reviews that mentioned being a bigger girl and the boots fitting so I was hopeful. I am completely satisfied with ordering these boots and I can't wait to wear them out. I tried them on right when I got the package and was amazed that they fit perfectly. I am a size 14 pants and I wear a size 9 in shoes. My thighs are on the bigger side so I am extremely happy they fit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great , they’ll make you look really cute !
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with these boots , they got some stretch & fit snugly up on my thighs without falling down yet don’t squeeze - where they go up my thigh measures 19 inches - fits super comfortable . I got the color taupe & am very happy with the color . I already have some thigh high boots but wanted a flat boot because I knew I’d want total comfort along with looking cute some days .
customer_reviews.author: Kitty .E

customer_reviews.title: ... that I could find boots to fit y 19" super plus calves
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond thrilled that I could find boots to fit y 19" super plus calves. Thank you so much! Do you have the same stretch boots in higher heels? Unfortunately, when I ordered another pair with high heels from another designer, I could not even get them in my feet, let alone pull them up. So, the picture and design may seem similar to the Premier brand, but they are not the same at allllllll.
customer_reviews.author: Sana

customer_reviews.title: these boots have more toe room.
customer_reviews.text: beautiful boots, but the toe part was painful and unbearable. I could have used a stretch shoe horn. Breaking these boots in was impossible. I wear a regular size 11 and never had a problem until now.Please add wide with to our collections for all size 11 customers for shoes/boots. I had to give them away to another family member and was sad about this and should have requested a refund, but wore them out in resulting with many bruised toes.. Roby
customer_reviews.author: Robby

customer_reviews.title: Good for big thighs!
customer_reviews.text: I was so hesitant about these boots. These Boots went over my big thighs they stretch very well. And true to size I want a size up and I have room for thick pair of socks I may just buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: KiraJ717

customer_reviews.title: Order size up!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these boots. They stay up on my tonight, super comfy material. Can’t say the quality of the boot is superb but you get what you pay for. I ordered a 9 which usually always fit me. I could have done with a 9 1/2 - 10. Not so uncomfortable that I can’t wear them. I would definitely recommend these boots for the price. Just be weary on the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fry

customer_reviews.title: Loved them! I am 5'8 and 155 lbs so ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved them ! I am 5'8 and 155 lbs so it is hard to find boots that come all the way to my thighs. These did and with ease, I will be ordering another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: and these are by far my favorite. I love the ones without the drawstring
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of over the knee boots, and these are by far my favorite. I love the ones without the drawstring! All of my other pairs have one and that’s the one thing about them that i don’t like. These look much sleeker and they stay PUT! More so than ones you have to tie! I’m in love. They are the perfect height too.. definitely a few inches over my knee and i am 5’8.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Great overall boot
customer_reviews.text: it actually stands in shape not like those shoes you tie at the hem. I will say that it doesn't necessarily fit my calves because mine are just skinny (i have skinny ankles) but it still fits the majority of the upper part of my legs'. I stand at a 5'7" with athletic build body. Also it feel as though the soles are cushioned which was a surprising plus. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Great VEGAN fashion boots!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I've been looking for! Comfortable, very low rubber/rubber-type heel, soft and VEGAN so no one had to die for fashion. What's not to like! I didn't need these for warmth, just fashion, so no lining works for me. They really are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: DMD

customer_reviews.title: My legs are pretty slim so if I don't have thick jeans on ...
customer_reviews.text: So comfy, bought my size, and even with a wide foot I have room for an insole. My legs are pretty slim so if I don't have thick jeans on to keep em up they slide down my knees a lil, but it's cool cuz they're made so they can be cuffed around the top of the thigh.
customer_reviews.author: MaryLiz

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots for the price
customer_reviews.text: They're fine for the price. They do start to slip down a bit when I'm walking, but it's not annoying and I'm able to pull them up again. Not a deal breaker. They fit as expected; I wear a size 8 and that's what I purchased. They're a nice light taupe color.
customer_reviews.author: Baldboys

customer_reviews.title: Don't stay up on my thighs
customer_reviews.text: Despite years of weightlifting, I've always been stuck with small(er) thighs. These fall down on me when I take 10 steps, and it's incredibly frustrating. It's more manageable when I wear jeans because I can safety pin the sides of the boot to my pants to help with the hold, but it's a lost cause wearing these with a skirt without anything underneath. Beware if you have smaller legs!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I've always had problems with boots because of my big thighs and calves. But these fit great I love them.
customer_reviews.author: leeishla jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: It was way to big. The zipper is there for decoration and the string barely adjusts anything. Returning
customer_reviews.author: RegularAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: super cute! this actually stay up on its own
customer_reviews.text: super cute! this actually stay up on its own. i had to get a size smaller. i have big feet and thin thighs but it fit well once i got a smaller size
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Suede
customer_reviews.text: Shoe size was VERY accurate! Really good quality for the price. I would buy them again :)
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Good style for taller ladies.
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots. I ordered wrong size and they were a bit too long for me, came up to my mid thigh, I'm not that tall , and the heel was a bit too flat. But it was good style and comfortable. A good style for taller ladies.
customer_reviews.author: Peaceblossom

customer_reviews.title: These are great! I have thicker thighs and calves and usually ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I have thicker thighs and calves and usually have to buy wide calf boots. But these are perfect! They have just enough stretch to fit comfortably around my legs and they stay up! I've worn them with tights, leggings, and on bare legs, I don't think I would want to wear them over pants. They length is good, they fit as pictured just above the knee.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots
customer_reviews.text: As a reference, I am 5.4 inches. These boots are very high on the thigh. If you are short and want a mid-thigh boot, these are going to be too much. They are about three inches down from my bum. I almost returned them but I do like the actual quality and color so decided to keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Barnes

customer_reviews.title: I love the way these shoes look
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these shoes look. The fit true to size and only slightly slip down my thin legs. The only downside is the left boot feels like it’s made of a cheaper/different material than the right. Like it’s stiffer and feels more.. plastic than the soft, suede feeling right boot.
customer_reviews.author: Montana

customer_reviews.title: A “STATEMENT”  COLOR
customer_reviews.text: I FREAKING Looooove these boots....They are so BRIGHT shiny Silver!!! A Statement for sure you have to know how to rock them without being to loud.But I’m in Love they fit as expected I typically wear 8 1/2 , but with boots I like to go up a half size because of thick socks But they didn’t have them in a 9 . But they still fit fine❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: wendy Allen

customer_reviews.title: she loved them very much
customer_reviews.text: They where for my niece and she loved them very much. Thay fit her very good I was worried about them fitting over her thighs but they fit great
customer_reviews.author: Arch

customer_reviews.title: Fits large calves
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’6” and have 17.5” calves and the boots hits mid thigh. I usually wear 8.5 shoes and ordered 9 to wear the boots with thick sweater socks and it fits perfectly. The taupe color is really cute. Just realize the suede is fake so it will look a bit cheap but a great pair of boots for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Jae Kim

customer_reviews.title: Fits large calves
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. I'm 5'6. Wear a size 14, have large 17.5" calves and it fits above the knee. Can wear alone with a dress. Jeans need to be skinny or leggings. But it's a good fit, won't slide down.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I did size up by 1/2. Surprisingly it does go above my thighs and I do have large thighs. These are comfortable and compliment's the legs. Nice with leggings and a sweater dress. Perfect for the East Coast cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: ♥️ Mrs. Arb

customer_reviews.title: Pretty boots 👢
customer_reviews.text: These were very nice boots but unfortunately they just didn’t look good on my skinny legs! They actually enhanced the skinnyness! They were slightly loose on me but I’m sure would fit fine on someone with normal legs. They were also too dressy for what I was looking for but otherwise very pretty and if I were younger and had bigger legs I would have kept them!
customer_reviews.author: Serena Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and you can wear them with a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and you can wear them with a lot of different style of outfits. I'm not sure how long thy will last though. Definitely throughout the season though.
customer_reviews.author: alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Not for these big thighs
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews that it fit big calf thigh girls. I have thick calves and thighs but am only size 6-8 in pants, so figured they would fit based on reviews. Nope, had to send back. Made muffin thigh rolls :(
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Waters

customer_reviews.title: Shoe part is comfortable. True to size
customer_reviews.text: Shoe part is comfortable. True to size. Boot/leg part is very poor quality material and doesn't stay up. I was pulling them up all day. Maybe if one wears a thick pair of leggings, they may stay up in place.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalinda K.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but runs really small. I tried 7.. and i think I need an 8/8.5
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute. Slip a little bit
customer_reviews.text: I think these boots are super cute! I like to wear mine with dresses for a transitional fall look. I got the kind with a draw strong because they were $5 cheaper than the ones without. They do slip a little so i tighten the drawstring until they don’t slip which can be a little uncomfortable but overall they feel really good around the feet/toes. I only wish they had half sizes because I’m an 8 1/2 so had to go to 9 and I can definitely tell
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Received worn boots.
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a NEW pair of boots and received a very worn pair of boots. The fabric that covers the thigh is extremely stretched out. The bottom of the boots are dirty and the heel is scuffed.
customer_reviews.author: Quishaawn✨ 🦋🙏🏽

customer_reviews.title: They’re almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a pair of flat heel thigh high boots for a while, and these are everything I wanted. The thigh has no stretch tho, and my hips and thighs are quite curvy, so these can only be worn with a skirt and tights, not jeans or leggings. I’m hoping the thigh stretches out a little bit with wear.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor K.

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad to pull them up
customer_reviews.text: My thighs aren't thin, not fat, but full and the tops boots do slide down. Not too bad to pull them up, though I wish' stay up. Great colors and texture. Very comfortable toe box. Great heel height and no discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte A.

customer_reviews.title: 💘 I love these Boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these They Don't slide down They Fit Just Right I had black ones I washed & dried them & they shrunk...so pls dont dry them and if u do make sure ur constantly checking on them
customer_reviews.author: Iana

customer_reviews.title: Tight and right
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these are bomb, I've tried a few pairs of everyday over the knee boots, but they were more like slouchy boots. These are snug with minimal slouch.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It fits close when wotn with socks and not very comfortable without. I usually wear size 8 and I ordered the 8.5....also the boots doesn't stay up once u start walking it falls down
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: My favorite boots ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so awesome! Super comfortable and easy to get on and off. They do have some stretch to them so they fit over jeans or leggings. They stay on really well and don’t slide down too much either. Not to mention they are SO soft! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these boots!! They fit great. I wear size 16 pants. Have not tried the boots with jeans, but I like to wear them with leggings under. Only thing is that I have a little bit of issues holding them up. But it's not too bad at all. Love the color. Very soft exterior. Very comfortable to wear for long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: The only problem I had was the string it has to make them tighter around the knee came off so I couldn't tighten one boot which was unfortunate but other than that very nice
customer_reviews.text: I do have some thick thighs & the fit very well they they had a full zip which made it easier to put on & take off. The only problem I had was the string it has to make them tighter around the knee came off so I couldn't tighten one boot which was unfortunate but other than that very nice
customer_reviews.author: Andrea J.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Stay Up
customer_reviews.text: No matter how hard I tried to tie these tight, they won't stay above the knee.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Austin

customer_reviews.title: my 2 girls love these boots
customer_reviews.text: my 2 girls love these boots. they both have thick legs and they were surprised to see the boots stretched over very comfortably. I did order a 1/2 size up after reading reviews. And glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: JKH

customer_reviews.title: Good for narrow feet mostly does slip down but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Good for narrow feet mostly does slip down but I don’t mind. I’m usually a 6 1/2 but I got a 6 little tight but I’ll keep them. Next order I’ll get a 6 1/2 !
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Boot
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and sexy. The boots stay up without slipping. I would say I have an average size leg – not too skinny or fat – and the boots are very comfortable. I received lots of compliments
customer_reviews.author: MST

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love! I love these boots. They are very comfortable and stylish. Be cautioned, I had to wear them a few times before they adjusted to the shape and movement of my feet. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sherria Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! I have thick thighs and boots typically are always tight on my calves and thighs, but these no problem! Not too tight, very comfy, and they dont slide down. Love these so much! I will be buying in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these
customer_reviews.text: They constantly fall down like saggy socks. The sole of the shoe started wearing of it look like a fur ball underneath the shoe after 5 times of being worn. Super poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Don Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Thigh High Love!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'8 and these boots actually reach my thighs! I reviewed them and my whole outfit purchased on Amazon on my youtube channel Nikki MsModel. I link this boots are comfortable and can spice up any outfit!
customer_reviews.author: NikkiMsModel

customer_reviews.title: Get a bigger size
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are cute and did the job. They were small and hurt my toes. I recommend going 1 size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Don’t really stay up as it doesn’t have any elastic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Boots
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute boots can't wait to wear. My legs are very muscular and these were able to fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix_ashes522

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Cute boots. Order a size up! I originally ordered an 8.5 (my size) returned them because they were too small. Got a size 9 and they still fit a bit snug. Bearable though with thinner socks. Fits great around the legs with pants!
customer_reviews.author: Lori M.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I am always wary of buying shoes online but these were just beautiful and comfortable. They fit lovely over the knee and don't slouch. There is a nice tie in the back if needed. Definitely buying from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: C. Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: so sexy!
customer_reviews.text: i love these! they are stretchy but don't feel like they will tear up. they slide a bit at the top for me but i wear them with thigh high socks to keep them up and keep me warm in winter. make sure to use good insoles with these. use a tooth brush to clean and brush gently. :)
customer_reviews.author: LadyMerf

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous to buy shoes online that I couldnt try in first but these are an amazing fit and feel like really good quality for the price! Purchased in grey and will be buying the black pair next!
customer_reviews.author: Kat W

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots, just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots, just as expected. My thighs are no where near small, but they do fall down. It can be quite annoying, but still worth the buy to me! i love them.
customer_reviews.author: Binaful

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my boots! Fit was good. Boots are very comfy. Fast shipment! Will do business again.
customer_reviews.author: F. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: They look just like they do in the pic but they did drive ...
customer_reviews.text: They look just like they do in the pic but they did drive me batty because they kept falling down to mid knee cap. I finally stopped fighting them and just wore them at mid knee cap level.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots and this my second time ordering but this ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots and this my second time ordering but this time I ordered olive green & got a tan pair so that was very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Brittnee Williams

customer_reviews.title: but other than that awesome. im size 7 and it fits good
customer_reviews.text: little bit long than i was expected, but other than that awesome. im size 7 and it fits good, you can order half size up
customer_reviews.author: bastas

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I actually really like the boots. Compare to paying more money for other boots that is so uncomfortable this wear easy to put on and off no issues. Fits true to it size
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!- Even with larger calves/ legs
customer_reviews.text: These boots are absolutely amazing! I originally bought them to use for a costume, but after trying them on I immediately fell in love. I was extremely worried ordering them that they wouldn't fit, I have 18 in. rather muscular calves and trouble finding knee high socks that even fit, but I had no problems with these boots. There was plenty of stretch and they even kinda fall down at the top but still stay above the knee so no real complaints. I was just tickled they fit. Love them, ordering another pair in black.
customer_reviews.author: Michela Blalock

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: They look great on! Just like in the picture. I love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saggy
customer_reviews.text: Boots are cute but they're a bit too long and keeps falling down. Not a whole lot but when it does, the zipper starts to sag and come out looking kind of funny.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Chasengnou

customer_reviews.title: Perfect over the knee boots
customer_reviews.text: I sized up so i could wear thicker socks! Super cute and superrrrr comfy! I have thighs but sometimes these slouch down a little bit! Overall good though!
customer_reviews.author: sydneyc123

customer_reviews.title: Thigh High
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I got them yesterday. They reach my thighs. I'm happy because in the winter I can wear almost anything because my boots will keep me warm. I got them to wear to work because they look high end and dressy but they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: L. Den

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Initially they fit tight, but after two wears they began to stretch and give.
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: Love my Vegan Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I really love my boots they are comfortable and fit well, and has that same suede look without being real suede.
customer_reviews.author: anand shantam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect💕💕
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of skeptical to buy these, but after reading the reviews I decided to take a chance and I'm glad I did!! They are perfect, and like others said, even stretch.💕
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful but hurts just a little in th front but will still rock it everyday. Definitely love the boots
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Get tons of compliments on these
customer_reviews.text: Got so many complements on these shoes goes with almost any outfit love love love these I'm going to buy 3 more colors!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Still happy but..
customer_reviews.text: Should of went with a half size bigger ( and I normally wear a size 8 in women's). It does roll down, but its nothing I couldn't take. Despite the cons still happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Muhaha

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They’re so cute. I’m usually a size 6-6.5 in shoes, but after reading the reviews I ordered a size 7, and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dianeee

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I think in time the top will stretch and slouch or fall, but very comfy and nice. I'll be buying in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: tawnya

customer_reviews.title: Great for thick legs!
customer_reviews.text: Let me say these boots are AWESOME. I have big feet size 10 and these are more comfortable than I thought. Not to mention I'm a size 16 in pants and I have thick legs and they FIT! It also fit on my friend who's a size 18 I'd say size 18 is the cap. But they are very comfy and just look great. Way better than the picture. I got black. This is my first review on the product. The box was kinda beat up but I'm not sure if that was just ups being harsh with the package.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: They cute.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that the boots do Go down however going to wear them with tights instead of stockings.
customer_reviews.author: Mory

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love these boot, everyone ask where did get them, Rey comfortable and affordable
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Griifith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These boots are comfortable, and the color is rich just like the picture suggests.
customer_reviews.author: Anewwayof

customer_reviews.title: Snug comfy boots!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my tiny legs well they don’t fall down. So glad I don’t have to pull my boots up all night.
customer_reviews.author: Lauria Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Great boot! Great quality, feels soft and has a nice comfy fit. If anything order a half size bigger. Great! Should buy more!! 😃😃😃😃👍🎁💋🎉🌸
customer_reviews.author: Yulia M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The boots are very comfortable. They do slip from the thighs a bit. But overall no serious complaints
customer_reviews.author: Linda

product_meta.title: Premier Standard - Women's Fashion Comfy Vegan Suede Block Heel Thigh High Over The Knee Boots
product_meta.description: These thigh high boots have a sleek suede upper and to add a touch of style to your everyday look. A must-have in every girl’s closet!
feature_bullets: PERFECT FIT AND STYLE: Versatile, thigh-high boots have a simple, sleek upper made out of vegan suede and a low, stacked heel adds some perfection to your look. Perfect for festivals and year round wear!
ENDLESS OUTFIT COMBINATIONS: Outfit and pair these boots from dusk until dawn! From jeans to shorts, dresses and skirts of any length, these boots are a surefire way to top off any outfit.

DURABLE LONG LASTING COMFORT: Effortlessly slips these on and off. A sturdy rubber outsole ensures maximum comfort through prolonged wear. A short ankle heel (0.25") adds to perfect and comfortable look and feel for your legs.
FINEST QUALITY: Worn for every season, these thigh-high boots feature a comfortable cushioned insole that snuggles your feet to provide comfort with every step.
APPROX MEASUREMENTS: Heel Height: 0.25" ; Shaft Length (including heel): 26.5"; Top Opening Circumference: 12"
